id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this PCF8574 component.



*See also: [PCF8574 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pcf8574.html#configuration-variables)*

pcf8575.docs:
**boolean**: Whether this is a 16-pin PCF8575. Defaults to `false`.



*See also: [PCF8574 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pcf8574.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x21`.



*See also: [PCF8574 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pcf8574.html#configuration-variables)*

pcf8574.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the PCF8574 component of the pin.



*See also: [PCF8574 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pcf8574.html#pin-configuration-variables)*

mode.docs:
**string**: A pin mode to set for the pin at. One of `INPUT` or `OUTPUT`.



*See also: [PCF8574 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pcf8574.html#pin-configuration-variables)*

inverted.docs:
**boolean**: If all read and written values should be treated as inverted. Defaults to `false`.



*See also: [PCF8574 I/O Expander](https://esphome.io/components/pcf8574.html#pin-configuration-variables)*
